metadata.title: CVE-2023-52578 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: net:bridge: use DEV_STATS_INC() syzbot/KCSAN reported data-races inbr_handle_frame_finish() [1] This function can run from multiple cpuswithout mutual exclusion. Adopt SMP safe DEV_STATS_INC() to updatedev->stats fields. Handles updates to dev->stats.tx_dropped while we are atit. [1] BUG: KCSAN: data-race in br_handle_frame_finish /br_handle_frame_finish read-write to 0xffff8881374b2178 of 8 bytes byinterrupt on cpu 1:
